selectedVerses.text: And when he had finished speaking, he said to Simon, "Put out into the deep and let down your nets for a catch."
For he and all who were with him were astonished at the catch of fish that they had taken,
For wicked men are found among my people; they lurk like fowlers lying in wait. They set a trap; they catch men.

"Behold, I am sending for many fishers, declares the LORD, and they shall catch them. And afterward I will send for many hunters, and they shall hunt them from every mountain and every hill, and out of the clefts of the rocks.
And she brought up one of her cubs; he became a young lion, and he learned to catch prey; he devoured men.
